name: Guarding our Sovereignty
description: The collapse of Mittelafrika has given [ROOT.GetNameDef] the opportunity to claim itself a sovereign state, let us not waste this.\n\nUnion, Work, Justice!

name: The [AFR_FormerOverlord_ADJ] Remnants
description: The hasty end of colonial rule has left behind many a soldier. It has, however, also left behind a decent amount of military materiel stashes in depots at key locations within our nation.

name: Analyse their Equipment
description: In the [AFR_FormerOverlord_ADJ] administration, our men were not taught the know-how of using modern equipment that our colonial masters used to keep the [ROOT.GetAdjective] nation subjugated. Although much of this equipment has fallen into our hands, we must learn how to use it before applying it to the battlefield.

name: A Modern African Army
description: Our soldiers have realized what is on the line, we have gathered what scattered equipment we could find and learned how to use new weapons and tactics. Though much is to be done we are on our way to create a unified and powerful army, ready to face any warlord that we come across!

name: Open Recruitment Program
description: Right now, [ROOT.GetNameDef] needs all the help on the front lines that it can get!

name: The Independence Push
description: [ROOT.GetNameDefCap] has felt its first taste of freedom, and is not going to give up the opportunity to be independent so easily!

name: A Homegrown Industry
description: With the lack of any significant industrial output, our nation will crumble battling against others who are more advanced economically. We must not let allow this to happen; our push towards industrialization must begin, and quickly.

name: A Push for Infrastructure
description: Under our [AFR_FormerOverlord_ADJ] overlords, infrastructure was neglected. As we push for industrialization we must invest in basic facilities such as buildings and roads, not only to create prosperity for our citizens but to support our soldiers on the frontlines.

name: Industrial Machinery
description: Developments in our agricultural and industrial tools have advanced our nation significantly. Although there is much work to be done, we have made the first steps towards a functioning, modern economy.

name: A Nascent Heavy Industrial Base
description: Investing into heavy industry will be costly, but it will be worth it, greatly contributing to our economic development and industrialization. We will be able to produce military equipment at a greater rate this way.

name: [ROOT.GetAdjective] Arms
description: The collapse of the [AFR_FormerOverlord_ADJ] administration in [ROOT.GetNameDef] has left behind large numbers of military equipment. However, if we are to focus on the long term prosperity and safety of [ROOT.GetNameDef], it would be wise to invest into armament factories, so we do not become reliant on foreign equipment.

name: International Waters
description: Ensuring that we have access to the sea is of utmost importance, especially in times of crisis such as this. With access to the sea we will be able to get raw materials and aid that we desperately need.

name: Join the International Community
description: With our government’s position solidified, we have declared ourselves a free and sovereign state, and are ready to join the international community. We should first look to nations who are willing to offer us support; whether it be that they have taken an interest to support our independence or are simply looking for new opportunities, we cannot pick and choose, given our precarious situation.

name: Materiel from [BEL.GetNameDef]
description: Not all of the ammunition we need can be produced domestically, nor can we find all of it laying on the ground somewhere. Petitioning our benefactor for guns will help us greatly.

name: [BEL.GetAdjective] Oversight
description: Our officers may be brave and vigorous fighting for our independence, but the unfortunate reality is that they are inexperienced. With [BEL.GetNameDef] overseeing our military affairs we will be able to create a modern army and learn new tactics.

name: Economic Aid from [BEL.GetNameDef]
description: With the introduction of foreign goods and services from [BEL.GetNameDef] we will be able to develop our economy much more efficiently.

name: The [BEL.GetAdjective] Miracle
description: Regardless of our benefactor’s intentions in assisting our development, none can argue that their help has allowed [ROOT.GetNameDef] to prosper. We are well on our way to an economic miracle.

name: Join the Cairo Pact
description: Egyptian investment, both economically and militarily, has been proven vital to the survival of our nation. We should repay their kindness by joining their faction, the Cairo Pact.

name: Materiel from [ENG.GetNameDef]
description: Not all of the ammunition we need can be produced domestically, nor can we find all of it laying on the ground somewhere. Petitioning our benefactor for guns will help us greatly.

name: The [ENG.GetAdjective] Miracle
description: Regardless of our benefactor’s intentions in assisting our development, none can argue that their help has allowed [ROOT.GetNameDef] to prosper. We are well on our way to an economic miracle.

name: Join the Phalanstere
description: Without our Internationale friends, our nation would likely not have prospered to the extent it has. Due to our lack of industrial capacity, it's not likely we can pay back any debts to them any time soon. However, we may repay them by formalizing our entry into their economic bloc, the Phalanstere.

name: The Declaration of Independence
description: Gabon has no master, it is a completely independent and sovereign state, free from any higher ruler.

name: Democracy Remains
description: Gabon shall forever remain an independent, democratic state!

name: The Socialist Coup
description: The Socialists now control the government of the state of Gabon, as it always should have been!

name: Contact the French Exiles
description: Having an alliance with the largest remaining nation in Africa would benefit us greatly

name: Contact the French Commune
description: The Commune is the source and inspiration of many revolutions, having them as allies would help us greatly!

name: Cooperate with Dahomey
description: Dahomey is another ally of the French exiles, and are close by. Cooperation between us could benefit us both

name: Invite French Advisors
description: If we were to invite them, there are several key figures in the Commune of France who may be sympathetic enough to our cause to help more directly.

name: Draft Constitution
description: As a young, independent state, Gabon has yet to pen a foundation for its laws. Doing so would lend legitimacy to our sovereignty!

name: The First Elections
description: Our newly drafted constitution calls for a democratic election of our first new leader! Several parties have enough support that the election could swing any which way on election night!

name: The Syndicalist Convention
description: The three major syndicalist factions must come to a conclusion as to which one will become the ruling party of Gabon!

name: Apply the Constitution
description: The ratification of a constitution will give much needed legitimacy to Gabon's sovereignty, and bring many in our nation together
